definitions.definition: belonging to or connected with the particular place or area that you are talking about or with the place where you live

examples.text: A local man was accused of the murder.
Our children go to the **local school**.
a **local newspaper** *(= one that gives local news)*
It was difficult to understand the local dialect.

definitions.definition: affecting only one part of the body

examples.text: Her tooth was extracted under **local anaesthetic**.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from late Latin localis, from Latin locus ‘place’.
